reviewText: An entertaining and informative look into the world of coyote hunting/ control. The author narrator and his hunting pals are so skilled , yet so humble. These guys are all serious marksmen, with that calm and cool demeanor that comes with experience in the field. The author demonstrates each call used,along with the reason for choosing a particular call. Lots of fun to watch even if you don't happen to be a coyote hunter yourself. Just ask my wife!

WE had seen this video before through Netflix and enjoyed it and knew our friend would enjoy it, so we bought it for him for his birthday.  He hasn't opened it yet, so don't know what he thinks of it yet.  I was tickled to find it at Amazon.com
Randy Anderson did an awesom job of putting this film together! In my opinion he is the best i've seen and he has many more on his own web site if u liked this one as much as i do.
this is a great dvd for any coyote hunter to get tips from. makes a great addition to any collection, or makes a great gift.

I haven't hunted any predators (yet) but after viewing this video I feel my chances for success are much improved.  Very well done with instruction woven in with hunting footage.  Randy Anderson has done an amazing job considering the fact he was both hunting and filming at the same time.
Great DVD, must have if you are getting into Coyote Hunting.  Now you neee to get Vol. 2
